title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
neat and clean 820-3115-b board turns on and chime sound coming, but chime sound repeats display not switching
no voltage drop found all coming continously even it chimes again and again   
tried clear me but no changes.

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
Tried one RAM module at time?
Still restarts starting in SMC bypass, or safe mode?

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
tried with different ram slotes
display not coming 
only repeated chime sound

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message: also the same happens in smc bypass mode

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
Did you test the board alone on the desk?
Don't connect anything, apart of charger, speaker and USB tester.

Any history available?

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message: yes tested board with dc jack and speaker only

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
Did you clean ME on its BIOS, or tried full new (clean) BIOS?

Check if SMC_ONOFF_L is steady high.
Also check SMC_TPAD_RST_L.

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
yes tried me bios /another working bios but same result
all voltages steady including SMC_ONOFF_L ,SMC_TPAD_RST_L.
I changed smc still same condition

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message: Check PCH's RTC signals if steady.

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
RTC_RESET_L
PCH_SRTCRST_L 
 PCH_INTRUDER_L 
PCH_INTVRMEN_L
all remains steady and 3.3v

title: 820-3115-b restarts
message:
CPU core cycles?
Also monitor PLT_RESET_L.
